mapper.select:
SELECT b.`name`, b.img, b.id, count(
IF(c.choice = '同意', 1, NULL) ) AS countAgreen, count(
IF(c.choice = '反对', 1, NULL) ) AS countReject, count(
IF(c.choice = '弃权', 1, NULL) ) AS countGiveUp, sum(
IF( c.choice = '同意', a.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumAgreen, sum(
IF( c.choice = '反对', a.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumReject, sum(
IF( c.choice = '弃权', a.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumGiveUp
FROM ( SELECT sum(a.acreage) AS acreage, c.id AS voteId, a.user_id AS userId FROM o_owner_org a, o_vote c WHERE c.id = #{voteId} AND a.org_id IN ( SELECT id FROM o_org WHERE id = c.org_id OR p_id = c.org_id ) GROUP BY a.user_id ) a, o_candidate b, o_vote_record c WHERE b.id = c.ca_id AND a.userId = c.user_id AND c.vote_id = a.voteId GROUP BY b.id

SELECT a.`name`, a.img, count(
IF(b.choice = '同意', 1, NULL) ) AS countAgreen, count(
IF(b.choice = '反对', 1, NULL) ) AS countReject, count(
IF(b.choice = '弃权', 1, NULL) ) AS countGiveUp, sum(
IF( b.choice = '同意', c.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumAgreen, sum(
IF( b.choice = '反对', c.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumReject, sum(
IF( b.choice = '弃权', c.acreage, NULL ) ) AS sumGiveUp FROM o_candidate a, o_vote_record b, o_owner c WHERE a.id = b.ca_id AND b.user_id = c.id AND b.vote_id = #{voteId} GROUP BY b.ca_id ORDER BY countAgreen DESC
